Title: 🖼 💡Desnyan district of Kyiv: power workers restored the light a...
Description: 💡Desnyansky district of Kyiv: power workers restored the light after the accident. This morning, an accident occurred at one of the substations in the Desnyansky district of the capital. As a result, 68,000 families were left without electricity. As of 09:30, power workers managed to restore power. The battle for light continues!

Title: 🖼 💪DTEK restores the light: in December, we managed to restore ...
Description: 💪DTEK restores the light: in December, we managed to restore electricity supply to almost 281,000 families after shelling by the Russian occupiers. 000 houses of Kyiv region. Thank you to the Defense Forces for the opportunity work! The battle for light continues 🇺🇦

Title: 🔁🎬 Today I am addressing everyone who appreciates Ukraine, prot...
Description: Forwarded From Zelenskiy / Official I am addressing today to all those who value Ukraine, protect their state, say with love about it: -Mine-, cannot imagine themselves without Ukraine, no matter where they are now. Everyone who has been fighting for her so steadfastly and so bravely for more than a thousand days. This is you. Our people. Ukrainian men and women. Everyone to whom I thank for this year 2024. To our people who go through all difficulties with dignity. People for whom being citizens of Ukraine is a matter of pride. And for me, it is a matter of pride to be the President of such people. Ukrainian men and women who prove: no cruise missiles can defeat a nation that has wings! Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🕯️A DTEK energy engineer was killed during a massive attack T...
Description: 🕯️A DTEK power engineer was killed during a massive attack. Today, the Russian occupiers killed our colleague Dmytro Petlenko, an engineer who worked at one of the thermal power plants. After carrying out search operations, he was found under the rubble without signs of life. Dmitry was 51 years old. He devoted more than 30 years to the profession of energy. He worked for a long time at the Zaporizhzhia TPP. After the occupation of Energodaru, he got a job at another thermal power plant of the company, where he continued the battle for light for the last year and a half. A great loss for the family of Ukrainian energy workers. We express our deepest condolences to everyone who knew and loved Dmytro. We will never forget. We will never forgive the Russian invaders.

Title: 🔁🖼 Every Russian massive strike requires time to prepare. It ne...
Description: Forwarded From Zelenskiy / OfficialEvery massive Russian strike requires time to prepare. It is never a spontaneous decision. This is a conscious choice not only of goals, but also of time and date. Today, Putin deliberately chose Christmas to attack. What could be more inhuman? More than 70 missiles, including ballistic ones, and more than a hundred attack drones. Goals are our energy. They continue to fight for a blackout in Ukraine. According to preliminary data, our defenders managed to shoot down more than 50 missiles and a significant part of drones. Unfortunately, there is a hit. As of now, there are outages in several regions. Power engineers are working to restore light as soon as possible. Thank you to everyone who is currently working for the country, who is on combat duty, who protects our sky. Let's restore the maximum. Russian evil will not break Ukraine or distort Christmas.

Title: 🖼 ‼️Russia struck the DTEK thermal power plants: the equipment w...
Description: ‼️Russia struck the DTEK thermal power plants: the equipment was seriously damaged. Today, the Russian Federation carried out another massive terrorist attack on the energy infrastructure of Ukraine. The DTEK thermal power plant was attacked. As a result of the massive attack, the equipment of the TPP was seriously damaged. After the end of the shelling, the energy companies quickly started to eliminate their consequences and restore the operation of the equipment. This year, this is already the thirteenth mass attack on the Ukrainian energy industry and the tenth mass attack on the company's energy enterprises. In total, since the beginning of the full-scale invasion, the DTEK thermal power plant has been fired upon more than 200 times

Title: ‼️Attention: power outage schedules for December 25 In connection...
Description: ‼️Attention: power outage schedules for December 25. In connection with the large-scale missile attack, Ukrenergo has provided commands to implement power outage schedules. Important: Ukrenergo teams may change during the day. Follow the updates on our Telegram channel! ⏺ Kyiv Queues 1.1, 1.2, 2.1, 2.2, 3.1, 3.2: the light will be out until 09:30. ⏺ Dnipropetrovsk Queues 1.1, 1.2: the light will be out until 08:30, from 12:00 to 3:30 p.m. and from 10:30 p.m. to 24:00. Queues 2.1, 2.2: light will be absent from 12:00 to 19:00 and from 22:30 to 24:00. Queues 3.1, 3.2: light will be absent until 12:00 and from 15:30 to 22:00 30. Queues 4.1, 4.2: the light will be absent until 12:00 and from 15:30 to 19:00. Queues 5.1, 5.2: the light will be absent until 12:00 and from 19:00 to 24:00. Queues 6.1, 6.2: the light will be absent from 12:00 to 15:30 and from 19:00 to 22:30. ⏺ Odeshchyna Queues 1.1, 1.2, 2.1, 2.2: the light will be on no light until 10:00. Lines 3.1, 3.2: lights will be off from 10:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. Lines 4.1, 4.2: lights will be off until 10:00. Lines 5.1, 5.2, 6.1, 6.2: lights will be off from 10 :00 to 13:00. ⏺ Kyiv region Queues 1.1, 1.2, 2.1, 2.2: no light until 09:00. Lines 3.1, 3.2: no light until 10:30. Lines 4.1, 4.2: no light until 09:00. Lines 5.1, 5.2, 6.1, 6.2 : light will be absent until 10:30.‼️Subscribe and share with relatives and friends.

Title: 🖼 Christ was born! Let's praise Him! Merry Christmas to all of u...

Title: 🖼 💡 For the first time, unique features were shown on the body ...
Description: 💡 On the hull of the destroyed Orest transformer, for the first time, unique footage from the Kurakhiv TPP, for which fierce battles are currently ongoing, was shown. A symbolic event took place in Kyiv on Energy Day. Transformer Orest became the first movie screen on which excerpts of the documentary The Last Prometheus of Donbas were presented. The tape tells about the work of the Kurakhiv thermal power station near the front line. The film crew lived together with the energy workers at the power plant and came under constant fire. The TPP worked until the end, but after critical destruction, it was forced to stop. But the mission of the energy workers did not stop there - they continued the battle for light at other thermal power plants. The documentary will be released in 2025. Director: Anton Shtuka.

Description: 💡DTEK energy workers returned the light to 1,214 families in Kyiv region after the shelling The work of energy workers does not stop for a minute, even on a professional holiday. Today, the enemy once again attacked Kyiv region and damaged electrical networks in the Boryspil district. As of 8:20 p.m., power supply to all homes was restored — ✅ The battle for light continues. Let's stand and win 🇺🇦

Title: 🎬 On Energy Day, we thank those without whom our work would not ...
Description: On Energy Day, we thank those without whom our work would be impossible: all the defenders of Ukraine, in particular the air defense forces, as well as the rescuers of the State Emergency Service 💪Also, our words of thanks to Oleksandr Usyk, who the day before chose victory and told the whole world about the indomitability of Ukrainian energy workers. The battle for light continues! 🇺🇦 Video is too big

Description: 🔥🔥🔥This is what a gift for Energy Day looks like! Oleksandr Usyk once again proved that Ukrainians can do the impossible, which giant would not have to deal with. In the same way, hundreds of thousands of Ukrainian energy workers impress the whole world when they repeatedly restore equipment after landing and continue to carry the light. Ukrainians are a powerful and invincible force. We will win! 🇺🇦

Title: 🖼 🖤 Volodymyr Dantes got a job at DTEK?! For Energy Day, a well...
Description: 🖤 ​​Volodymyr Dantes got a job at DTEK?! By the Energy Day, the famous Ukrainian singer tried himself as an employee of our repair team. Together with the team, he plunged into reality, where every day is a struggle for light. How was it? Watch on our YouTube channel.

Title: 🎬 Today is Energy Day. Day of victory of light over darkness. A ...
Description: Today is Energy Day. The day of the victory of light over darkness. The day of hard round-the-clock work despite fatigue. You only have to look up. Catch the signal. Turn off the generator, extinguish the candles. Catch yourself thinking - How little is needed for happiness - and realize that this - little - is given with great effort. We thank the Defense Forces, thanks to which the energy industry is able to work. We thank all Ukrainian companies that stick together and continue their work in the face of extremely difficult challenges. Happy holidays. The battle for light continues! Video is too big

Title: 🖼 ❤️‍🔥 Sincere emotions and faith in victory: Oleksandr Usyk me...
Description: ❤️‍🔥 Sincere emotions and faith in victory: Oleksandr Usyk met with veterans of the Russian-Ukrainian war. We would like to remind you that 40 Ukrainian veterans went to the fight of the Ukrainian champion with Tyson Fury in Saudi Arabia. Among them are miners and energy workers of DTEK, metallurgists -Metinvest-, as well as defenders of Azovstal. The historic fight for the championship titles in super heavyweight will take place tomorrow 🥊 We believe in Alexander's victory and continue our fight. The battle for light continues!💡🇺🇦

The goal of our joint campaign #BattleForLight is to draw attention to the problems of the energy industry, which is constantly suffering from Russian terrorist attacks. We believe in victory, because light always defeats darkness!💡🇺🇦 Video is too big

Title: 🔁🎬 On the eve of the Energy Day, he met with our employees of t...
Description: Forwarded From Zelenskiy / OfficialOn the eve of the Energy Day, he met with our workers in the energy sector and honored them with state awards. For the third year already, our energy sector is a target for Russia, and this enemy is always looking for the most vile options for strikes. Each time, missile and drone strikes are calculated to cause maximum damage to our generation and networks. And every time our people do their best to provide electricity to cities and villages as soon as possible. We thank everyone who works for light for Ukrainians, for heat in our apartments and houses. 🇺🇦🇺🇦🇺🇦 Video is too big

Title: 🖼 💡Kyiv region: DTEK energy workers returned the light to 104,0...
Description: 💡Kyiv region: DTEK energy workers returned the lights to 104,000 families after bad weather On December 16-18, severe bad weather raged in Kyiv region. As a result, 104,000 homes were left without electricity. Energy workers managed to repair all the damage. Currently, almost all families have electricity again. We continue to process point applications. The battle for light continues! 🇺🇦

Description: 💡-Battle for light-: Ukrainian veterans will support Oleksandr Usyk About 40 Ukrainian veterans went to the fight of the Ukrainian champion with Tyson Fury in Saudi Arabia. Title: 🎬 🇺🇦#BattleForLight: Oleksandr Usyk together with famous Ukrai...
Description: 🇺🇦#BattleForLight: Oleksandr Usyk, together with famous Ukrainian musicians, supported air defense, rescuers and energy workers. Our legendary boxer and champion appealed to the musicians to organize a flash mob and write a real national anthem -Battle for light-, dedicated to everyone who does not allow Ukraine to be plunged into darkness .🔥 Already on the first day, Oleksandr Usyk's appeal was supported by ONUKA, MONATIK and Dakh Daughters. Thank you to everyone who supports air defense, rescuers and energy workers in these times of historical challenges. The battle for light continues! Video is too big

Title: 🖼 ‼️Kyiv, Kyiv region, Dnipropetrovsk region, Odesa region: new ...
Description: ‼️Kyiv, Kyiv region, Dnipropetrovsk region, Odesa region: new shutdown schedules are expected approximately from one o'clock in the morning New schedules introduced by Ukrenergo will start as early as December 16. We talked about the changes in detail in our video. The systems are being updated, so the one-time graphics will arrive at night. They will be available from approximately 01:00 on December 16 on our Telegram channel. ‼️Important. Please, from 01:00 on December 16, check which queue your house is in. Where it will be possible to do this: In Telegram chatbots: 📍 Kyiv📍 Kyiv Oblast📍 Dnipropetrovsk Oblast📍 Odesa Odesa 🖤 Or on the sites of DTEK distribution system operators in Kyiv or your region. ▪️ In case of changes, we will promptly inform you on our channel. Please subscribe and share with your family and friends.

Title: 🖼 💡Odesa: emergency shutdowns continue due to network overload ...
Description: 💡Odesa: emergency shutdowns continue due to network overload after a massive attack in Odesa and Odesa district emergency shutdowns continue. This is a forced step to maintain the stability of our facilities. In other districts of the region, the schedule of stabilization shutdowns. We continue to do everything possible to eliminate the consequences of shelling. The battle for light continues!
